I visited the border just last month. I talked with border patrol about their lack of resources and saw some of the most vulnerable spots. There’s been a heated discussion about this, but to me there’s no doubt this is a crisis - an emergency.

html: Rep. John Dingell, the longest serving member of Congress passed away yesterday. Please join me in praying for his wife Rep. Debbie Dingell, his family and loved ones. Rep. Dingell served in the Army during WWII and was one of the last WWII veterans to serve in Congress.
text: Rep. John Dingell, the longest serving member of Congress passed away yesterday. Please join me in praying for his wife Rep. Debbie Dingell, his family and loved ones.  Rep. Dingell served in the Army during WWII and was one of the last WWII veterans to serve in Congress.

html: Some localities in our country have extended the right to vote to non-citizens. This diminishes the voting power of US citizens. I voted yesterday in favor of a resolution that recognizes this fact. The sanctity of the vote in our federal system MUST be protected.

One big concern is the Yadkin River flooding--with heavy winds and additional rain, trees are more prone to fall. 

#NC13 also has a 20 man disaster relief team on standby to head east. Remember, you can call 2-1-1 for information on food, shelters and flooding.

html: #FlorenceNC safety tips: - STAY INDOORS. Do not venture out during the storm. - Do NOT drive or walk through stagnant or moving floodwaters. - If your power goes out, do NOT operate gas powered generators or charcoal grills in or near your home. - Have your emergency kit ready!
text:
#FlorenceNC safety tips:
- STAY INDOORS. Do not venture out during the storm.
- Do NOT drive or walk through stagnant or moving floodwaters. 
- If your power goes out, do NOT operate gas powered generators or charcoal grills in or near your home.
- Have your emergency kit ready!

html: "Consumer confidence rose in August to its highest level since October 2000, building on July's solid result. The Conference Board's index rose to 133.4 in August, despite expectations from a survey of Reuters' economists that it would fall to 126.7."https://www.cnbc.com/2018/08/28/august-consumer-confidence.html …
text: "Consumer confidence rose in August to its highest level since October 2000, building on July's solid result. html: I said this earlier this week, but it bears repeating. I do not support separating minor children from their parents at our border and this legislation would fix this issue. For years now, the laws on how to handle children of illegal immigrants have been vague.
text: I said this earlier this week, but it bears repeating. I do not support separating minor children from their parents at our border and this legislation would fix this issue. For years now, the laws on how to handle children of illegal immigrants have been vague.

html: One thing it would do is clarify the Flores Settlement of ‘97 so that children of illegal immigrants who are apprehended at the southern border are not separated from their parent or legal guardian while in custody of the Department of Homeland Security.
text: One thing it would do is clarify the Flores Settlement of ‘97 so that children of illegal immigrants who are apprehended at the southern border are not separated from their parent or legal guardian while in custody of the Department of Homeland Security.

html: I am now a cosponsor of the Equal Protection of Unaccompanied Minors Act led by @RepMarkMeadows. This bill would take many steps to ensure families who cross our border illegally aren’t separated.
text: I am now a cosponsor of the Equal Protection of Unaccompanied Minors Act led by @RepMarkMeadows. This bill would take many steps to ensure families who cross our border illegally aren’t separated.

html: H.R. 5227 is simple, but necessary piece of legislation. It would call on the Treasury Department to develop a national strategy to identify and combat terror and other illicit use of virtual currencies. It’s a step in the right direction.
text: H.R. 5227 is simple, but necessary piece of legislation. It would call on the Treasury Department to develop a national strategy to identify and combat terror and other illicit use of virtual currencies. It’s a step in the right direction.

html: And this of course increasingly means using virtual currencies. So, we in Congress are in a tough spot, we have to figure out a way to keep this nascent industry from being regulated to death while also coming up with ways to combat illicit use.
text: And this of course increasingly means using virtual currencies. So, we in Congress are in a tough spot, we have to figure out a way to keep this nascent industry from being regulated to death while also coming up with ways to combat illicit use.

html: Today, I co-sponsored HR 5227, the Preventing Rogue and Foreign Actors from Evading Sanctions Act. through my work on the Terrorism and Illicit Finance Subcommittee, I’ve seen first hand how terrorists and other illicit actors use new and innovative ways to bypass sanctions.
text: Today, I co-sponsored HR 5227, the Preventing Rogue and Foreign Actors from Evading Sanctions Act. through my work on the Terrorism and Illicit Finance Subcommittee, I’ve seen first hand how terrorists and other illicit actors use new and innovative ways to bypass sanctions.

html: While we have been doing a good job combating the Islamic State over the past year, we have to be on constant alert. That means making sure we utilize every tool in our toolkit to stop them.
text: While we have been doing a good job combating the Islamic State over the past year, we have to be on constant alert. That means making sure we utilize every tool in our toolkit to stop them.

html: Our language also calls for specifics on US efforts to address and end these mechanisms. Islamic terrorists like ISIS, and their affiliates in the region, continue to evolve and adopt more sophisticated means to fund their terror operations.

html: My amendment to the 2019 NDAA, that I introduced with my friends @RepSinema and @RepBrianFitz, has passed the House. We are calling for a detailed report on how the Islamic State is leveraging different financing mechanisms to fund their terrorist activity.
